help-file.title: BEARSTRENGTH
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Animal
This spell increases the victim's strength, while slightly decreasing the victim's dexterity. Because of the spell's detrimental effects, the victim will save against it. Thus, if the victim wants to be the recipient, he should "consent" the caster.
